RT @TVNBR: LIVE: President @dilmabr addresses the 3rd National Festival of #JuventudeRural http://t.co/p3mX3NcIFQ
The advisory tweets now excerpts of the speech of the president during Festival of #JuventudeRural, in Brasilia.
All that was done in this country was the protagonist of the relationship between government and social movements. #JuventudeRural
We respond to the demands: 22 thousand young people will be assisted by technical assistance and rural extension with the new call opened by MDA.
BNDES and the BB Foundation will invest R $ 5 million to support the organization of collective ventures of rural youth with a family base.
Our task is to give rural youth access to land, through an agrarian reform with quality. #JuventudeRural
Without internet in the field there will be no presence of young people. My government is committed to bringing broadband to the rural region of Brazil.
Our job is also to guarantee quality housing. That's why we have #MyMountain Cottage. #JuventudeRural

RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo - President @dilmabr participates in a meeting with trade union centrals: http://t.co/nsMF9zhToD
The first of May has been a date to evaluate, advance and celebrate achievements.
Among thousands of direct d conquered few are as important as the minimum wage, in a country that has income inequality like ours.
In March of 2015, we sent to the Congress the project of valorization of the minimum wage for 2015-2019.
It is fundamental that we can guarantee by law, until 2019, the increase in the purchasing power of the minimum wage.
In the last 4 years of my mandate, through the valorization policy, we have had a minimum wage increase above inflation of 14.88%.
In 2013, by demand of the plants, we sent the reduction of the income tax on the PLR.
We also reduced the federal taxes on food and basic food products to zero, which is fundamental for the workers.
Regarding the Outsourcing PL, it is urgent to regulate the outsourced work in Brazil to have protection and guarantee of living wage.
It is also important for entrepreneurs to have clear legislation.
However, regulation needs to maintain the differentiation between end activities and middle activities.
It is necessary to ensure that the worker is guaranteed the rights earned in the wage negotiations.
The commitment of my gov. is that we have the rights and the guarantees of the workers are maintained and we will do it with a lot of dialogue.
Nothing is better than the frank and transparent dialogue between the social segments that are benefited by measures.
I sign the decree that creates a Debate Forum on Employment, Labor, Income and Pension Policies.
It will be composed of workers' centers, representations of retirees and pensioners, entrepreneurs and government.
